thread.title: GRANDSON OF METRO FOUNDER CHARGED FOR DRUG OFFENCE
thread.title_full: GRANDSON OF METRO FOUNDER CHARGED FOR DRUG OFFENCE

author: farhan
title: GRANDSON OF METRO FOUNDER CHARGED FOR DRUG OFFENCE
text:
GRANDSON OF METRO FOUNDER CHARGED FOR DRUG OFFENCE   
Dear A.S.S. Editor Advertisement 
Another rich man that comes from a rich family is to be charged in courts for drug-related offences. This time, the man, Ong Jenn, is a grandson of the founder of Metro, and son of the of its former group managing director. 
Ong was first charged on Nov 1, 2014 with trafficking in cannabis, as well as possession and consumption of the drug. All these rich people who comes from a rich family, seems like they got too much moeny and time on their hands, thus dabbling in all these nonsense. Their fathers and grandfathers had built an empire from all the hard work, and the third generation have nothing better to do but destroy the good name of the family. 
Rich and privileged. These is what the elites are dabbling in. 
Danny Soh 
A.S.S. Contributor Editor's Note: 
If not, why not give us a 'Like' ? Filed Under:
